gānzàng /gan1 zang4/*
■ liver
gānzào /gan1zao4/
1. (of weather, climate, soil etc) dry; arid
2. (of skin, mouth etc) dry
3. (fig.) dull; dry; boring
4. (of timber etc) to dry out; to season; to cure
gānzào /gan1zao4/
gānzàozhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. (of weather, climate, soil etc) dry; arid
2. (of skin, mouth etc) dry
3. (fig.) dull; dry; boring
4. (of timber etc) to dry out; to season; to cure
gānzào /gan1zao4/
gānzàoguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. (of weather, climate, soil etc) dry; arid
2. (of skin, mouth etc) dry
3. (fig.) dull; dry; boring
4. (of timber etc) to dry out; to season; to cure
gānzào /gan1zao4/
gānzàole, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. (of weather, climate, soil etc) dry; arid
2. (of skin, mouth etc) dry
3. (fig.) dull; dry; boring
4. (of timber etc) to dry out; to season; to cure

gǎi'èxiàngshàn /gai3 e4 xiang4 shan4/*
■ turn away from evil and follow virtue
gǎn /gan3/
1. to dare; daring; (polite) may I venture
2. to feel; to move; to touch; to affect; feeling; emotion; (suffix) sense of ~
3. to overtake; to catch up with
4. to hurry; to rush
5. to try to catch (the bus etc)
6. to drive (cattle etc) forward; to drive (sb) away
7. to avail oneself of (an opportunity)
8. until; by (a certain time)
9. stick; pole; lever; classifier for long objects such as guns
10. to roll (dough etc)
11. stalks of grain
12. place name; wash
13. yellowcheek (Elopichthys bambusa)

gàn /gan4/
1. tree trunk; main part of sth; to manage; to work; to do; capable; cadre; to kill (slang); to fuck (vulgar); (coll.) pissed off; annoyed
2. violet or purple
3. dawn (archaic)
4. sunset; evening
5. tree trunk
6. Chinese mulberry; sandalwood
7. (archaic) water leaking into a boat; historically, the name of a river in Jiangxi; (neologism) to fuck (euphemistic variant of »gàn«)
8. shinbone
gàn /gan4/
gànzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. tree trunk; main part of sth; to manage; to work; to do; capable; cadre; to kill (slang); to fuck (vulgar); (coll.) pissed off; annoyed
2. violet or purple
3. dawn (archaic)
4. sunset; evening
5. tree trunk
6. Chinese mulberry; sandalwood
7. (archaic) water leaking into a boat; historically, the name of a river in Jiangxi; (neologism) to fuck (euphemistic variant of »gàn«)
8. shinbone
gàn /gan4/
gànguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. tree trunk; main part of sth; to manage; to work; to do; capable; cadre; to kill (slang); to fuck (vulgar); (coll.) pissed off; annoyed
2. violet or purple
3. dawn (archaic)
4. sunset; evening
5. tree trunk
6. Chinese mulberry; sandalwood
7. (archaic) water leaking into a boat; historically, the name of a river in Jiangxi; (neologism) to fuck (euphemistic variant of »gàn«)
8. shinbone
gàn /gan4/
gànle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. tree trunk; main part of sth; to manage; to work; to do; capable; cadre; to kill (slang); to fuck (vulgar); (coll.) pissed off; annoyed
2. violet or purple
3. dawn (archaic)
4. sunset; evening
5. tree trunk
6. Chinese mulberry; sandalwood
7. (archaic) water leaking into a boat; historically, the name of a river in Jiangxi; (neologism) to fuck (euphemistic variant of »gàn«)
8. shinbone
Gàn /Gan4/
■ abbr. for Jiangxi Province »Jiāngxī Shěng«; Gan River in Jiangxi Province »Jiāngxī Shěng«

■ cadre; official; officer; manager

1. ability; capable
2. capability; capable person

■ (coll.) to have a meal
gàng /gang4/
1. coffin-bearing pole (old)
2. thick pole; bar; rod
3. thick line
4. to mark with a thick line
5. to sharpen (a knife, razor etc)
6. to get into a dispute with
7. standard; criterion
8. hyphen; dash
9. stupid (Wu dialect)

gào /gao4/
1. (bound form) to say; to tell
2. to announce; to report
3. to denounce
4. to file a lawsuit; to sue
5. to moisten; to grease; to apply (cream, ointment); to dip a brush in ink
6. zirconium (chemistry)
7. to enjoin; to grant (a title)

gēng /geng1/
1. to change or replace; to experience; one of the five two-hour periods into which the night was formerly divided; watch (e.g. of a sentry or guard)
2. thick soup
3. to plow; to till
4. age; seventh of the ten Heavenly Stems »shítiāngān«; seventh in order; letter "G" or Roman "VII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc; ancient Chinese compass point: 255°; hepta
5. (literary) to continue; to carry on
6. terrier; also pr. »gěng«
7. a rope
gēng /geng1/
gēngzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to change or replace; to experience; one of the five two-hour periods into which the night was formerly divided; watch (e.g. of a sentry or guard)
2. thick soup
3. to plow; to till
4. age; seventh of the ten Heavenly Stems »shítiāngān«; seventh in order; letter "G" or Roman "VII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc; ancient Chinese compass point: 255°; hepta
5. (literary) to continue; to carry on
6. terrier; also pr. »gěng«
7. a rope
gēng /geng1/
gēngguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to change or replace; to experience; one of the five two-hour periods into which the night was formerly divided; watch (e.g. of a sentry or guard)
2. thick soup
3. to plow; to till
4. age; seventh of the ten Heavenly Stems »shítiāngān«; seventh in order; letter "G" or Roman "VII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc; ancient Chinese compass point: 255°; hepta
5. (literary) to continue; to carry on
6. terrier; also pr. »gěng«
7. a rope
gēng /geng1/
gēngle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to change or replace; to experience; one of the five two-hour periods into which the night was formerly divided; watch (e.g. of a sentry or guard)
2. thick soup
3. to plow; to till
4. age; seventh of the ten Heavenly Stems »shítiāngān«; seventh in order; letter "G" or Roman "VII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc; ancient Chinese compass point: 255°; hepta
5. (literary) to continue; to carry on
6. terrier; also pr. »gěng«
7. a rope

gé /ge2/
1. square; frame; rule; (legal) case; style; character; standard; pattern; (grammar) case; (classical) to obstruct; to hinder; (classical) to arrive; to come; (classical) to investigate; to study exhaustively

gěng /geng3/
1. branch; stem; stalk; CL: gēn
2. to block; to hinder; (neologism that evolved from »gén«, initially in Taiwan, during the first decade of the 21st century) memorable creative idea (joke, catchphrase, meme, neologism, witty remark etc); prominent feature of a creative work (punchline of a joke, trope in a drama, special ingredient in a dish, riff in a pop song etc)
3. to choke with emotion; to choke on a piece of food
4. strip of high ground; low earth dyke separating fields
5. (literary) bright; brilliant
6. honest; upright
7. to choke on a piece of food
8. to choke on a piece of food; (literary) a fish bone lodged in one's throat
9. (literary) well rope (for drawing water)

gōu /gou1/
1. to attract; to arouse; to tick; to strike out; to delineate; to collude

7. archer's arm guard

gòu /gou4/
1. enough (sufficient); enough (too much); (coll.) (before adj.) really; (coll.) to reach by stretching out
2. to buy; to purchase
3. (Tw) (coll.) variant of »gòu«; to reach by stretching
4. to construct; to form; to make up; to compose; literary composition; paper mulberry (Broussonetia papyrifera)
5. dirt; disgrace
6. to marry; to copulate
7. inner rooms of palace; ten billions
8. copulate; good
9. to draw a bow to the full; the range of a bow and arrow
10. complete; meet unexpectedly; see
11. disgrace; to revile
12. meet unexpectedly
13. crowing of pheasant

gòu /gou4/
gòule, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.

2. to buy; to purchase
3. (Tw) (coll.) variant of »gòu«; to reach by stretching
4. to construct; to form; to make up; to compose; literary composition; paper mulberry (Broussonetia papyrifera)

1. mountain pass
2. to close; to shut; to turn off
3. to confine; to lock (sb) up; to shut (sb in a room, a bird in a cage etc)
4. to concern; to involve
5. government official; governmental; official; public; organ of the body
6. to look at; to watch; to observe; to behold; to advise; concept; point of view; outlook
7. hat; crown; crest; cap
8. coffin
9. widower
10. keeper of domestic animals; herdsman; (old) hired hand in certain trade
11. Skimmia japonica
12. incapacitated; inefficient
13. (herb mentioned in ancient texts)
guān /guan1/
guānle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. mountain pass
2. to close; to shut; to turn off
3. to confine; to lock (sb) up; to shut (sb in a room, a bird in a cage etc)
4. to concern; to involve
5. government official; governmental; official; public; organ of the body
6. to look at; to watch; to observe; to behold; to advise; concept; point of view; outlook
7. hat; crown; crest; cap
8. coffin
9. widower
10. keeper of domestic animals; herdsman; (old) hired hand in certain trade
11. Skimmia japonica
12. incapacitated; inefficient
13. (herb mentioned in ancient texts)

guāncai /guan1cai5/
■ coffin; CL: jù, kǒu
guāncaibǎn /guan1cai5ban3/
1. wooden board used to make a coffin (also refers to the coffin itself); (fig.) (of a facial expression) grim; unsmiling
2. coffin bread, a Taiwanese snack consisting of a thick slab of bread, fried or toasted, then hollowed out, filled with a thick stew, and capped with a "coffin lid" (slice of fried bread)

guà /gua4/
1. to hang; to suspend (from a hook etc)
2. to hang up (the phone)
3. (of a line) to be dead
4. to be worried; to be concerned
5. (dialect) to make a phone call
6. to register (at a hospital); to make an appointment (with a doctor)
7. (slang) to kill; to die; to be finished; to fail (an exam)
8. classifier for sets or clusters of objects
9. divinatory diagram; one of the eight divinatory trigrams of the Book of Changes »Yìjīng«; one of the sixty-four divinatory hexagrams of the Book of Changes »Yìjīng«
10. to hinder; to offend; to form; unique
11. squares of a chess board
12. (bound form) Chinese-style unlined garment; gown
13. to deceive; to disturb
guà /gua4/
guàzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to hang; to suspend (from a hook etc)
2. to hang up (the phone)
3. (of a line) to be dead

10. to hinder; to offend; to form; unique
11. squares of a chess board
12. (bound form) Chinese-style unlined garment; gown
13. to deceive; to disturb

10. to hinder; to offend; to form; unique

13. to deceive; to disturb
guà /gua4/

guàn /guan4/
1. can; jar; pot
2. to irrigate; to pour; to install (software); to record (music)
3. Taoist monastery; palace gate watchtower; platform
4. accustomed to; used to; indulge; to spoil (a child)
5. to put on a hat; to be first; to dub
6. to pierce through; to pass through; to be stringed together; string of 1000 cash
7. crane; stork
8. to fling; to fall; to wear
9. pour out libation
10. two tufts of hair; young; underage
11. two bunches of hair on a child
12. (classical) to boil
13. light a fire
14. jade used for making goblets
15. to wash (especially hands)
16. brilliant (of eyes)
17. (archaic) stork; heron

guī /gui1/
1. to return; to go back to; to give back to; (of a responsibility) to be taken care of by; to belong to; to gather together; (used between two identical verbs) despite; to marry (of a woman) (old); division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
2. tortoise; turtle; (coll.) cuckold
3. compass; a rule; regulation; to admonish; to plan; to scheme
4. small arched door; boudoir; lady's chamber; (fig.) women
5. silicon (chemistry)
6. jade tablet, square at the base and rounded or pointed at the top, held by the nobility at ceremonies
7. sundial
8. (ancient unit of volume) a tiny amount; a smidgen; a speck
9. trout; salmon
10. (semiprecious stone); extraordinary
11. to comply with; to follow
12. grand; strange; exotic
13. cuckoo; revolution of a wheel
14. nonstandard simplified variant of »guī«
15. zelkova tree
16. name of a river in Shanxi
17. Rubus tokkura

guīhuà /gui1hua4/
guīhuàzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to draw up a plan; to map out a program
2. a plan; a program
3. naturalization
guīhuà /gui1hua4/
guīhuàguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to draw up a plan; to map out a program
2. a plan; a program
3. naturalization
guīhuà /gui1hua4/
guīhuàle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to draw up a plan; to map out a program
2. a plan; a program
3. naturalization

gū /gu1/
1. lone; lonely
2. to estimate
3. hoop; to bind with hoops
4. (onom.) for the sound of a bird, an empty stomach etc
5. paternal aunt; husband's sister; husband's mother (old); nun; for the time being (literary)
6. (bound form) mushroom
7. to buy; to sell
8. Manchurian wild rice (Zizania latifolia), now rare in the wild, formerly harvested for its grain, now mainly cultivated for its edible stem known as »jiāobáisǔn«, which is swollen by a smut fungus
9. wheel; to roll
10. (onom.) bird call
11. name of a river
12. (bamboo); trumpet for chariots
13. large fishing net
14. goblet; rule; law
15. big bone
16. wheel
17. crime; sin
18. to deal in liquors
19. partridge; Francolinus chinensis

gǔ /gu3/
1. thigh
2. part of a whole; portion of a sum
3. (finance) stock; share
4. strand of a thread
5. low-level administrative unit, translated as "section" or "department" etc, ranked below »kē«
6. classifier for long winding things like ropes, rivers etc
7. classifier for smoke, smells etc: thread, puff, whiff
8. classifier for bands of people, gangs etc
9. classifier for sudden forceful actions
10. bone
11. ancient; old; paleo-
12. drum; CL: tòng, miàn
13. to drum; to strike; to rouse; to bulge; to swell
14. grain; corn
15. valley
16. merchant; to buy
17. arch. legendary venomous insect; to poison; to bewitch; to drive to insanity; to harm by witchcraft; intestinal parasite
18. (chemistry) cobalt (Taiwan pr. »gū«); used in 𬭁»gǔmǔ«
19. paper mulberry tree
20. cricket
21. good fortune; longevity
22. clean; to rub
23. scraps of wood
24. confused; extinguished; (onom.) used in »gǔgǔ«
25. name of a river in Hunan
26. river name in Henan province
27. bullock; cow
28. covered pot
29. blind; undiscerning
30. to implicate; net for birds or fish
31. black ewe
32. dropsical; swollen
33. to comment; to explain
34. hub of wheel
35. center or bull's eye of an archery target (old); goal; target

gǔdòng /gu3dong4/
gǔdòngle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to urge (an activity that may be beneficial, harmful or neutral); to encourage; to agitate; to instigate; to incite
2. to beat; to flap (wings, a fan etc)

1. to employ; to hire; to rent
2. to look after; to take into consideration; to attend to
3. happening; instance; reason; cause; intentional; former; old; friend; therefore; hence; (of people) to die, dead

háng /hang2/
hángzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. (bound form) row; line
2. (bound form) line of business; trade; profession
3. (bound form) commercial firm
4. (bound form) to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)
5. (in data tables) row; (Tw) column
6. classifier for rows or lines
7. boat; ship; craft; to navigate; to sail; to fly
8. throat
9. cangue (stocks to punish criminals)
10. to quilt
11. fly down
háng /hang2/
hángguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. (bound form) row; line
2. (bound form) line of business; trade; profession
3. (bound form) commercial firm
4. (bound form) to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)
5. (in data tables) row; (Tw) column
6. classifier for rows or lines
7. boat; ship; craft; to navigate; to sail; to fly
8. throat
9. cangue (stocks to punish criminals)
10. to quilt
11. fly down
háng /hang2/
hángle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. (bound form) row; line
2. (bound form) line of business; trade; profession
3. (bound form) commercial firm
4. (bound form) to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)

6. classifier for rows or lines
7. boat; ship; craft; to navigate; to sail; to fly
8. throat

háo /hao2/
1. roar; cry
2. grand; heroic
3. hair; drawing brush; (in the) least; one thousandth; currency unit, 0.1 yuan
4. howl; bawl
5. oyster
6. to howl (like a wolf)
7. moat; (military) trench
8. trench
9. to intimidate
10. to shout; to roar; to terrify; swiftly
háo /hao2/
háozhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. roar; cry
2. grand; heroic
3. hair; drawing brush; (in the) least; one thousandth; currency unit, 0.1 yuan
4. howl; bawl
5. oyster
6. to howl (like a wolf)
7. moat; (military) trench
8. trench
9. to intimidate
10. to shout; to roar; to terrify; swiftly
háo /hao2/
háoguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.

2. grand; heroic

4. howl; bawl
5. oyster
6. to howl (like a wolf)
7. moat; (military) trench
8. trench
9. to intimidate
10. to shout; to roar; to terrify; swiftly

hǎiguī /hai3 gui1/*
1. turtle; Internet slang for »hǎiguī«

hǎiguī /hai3 gui1/*
hǎiguīzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. turtle; Internet slang for »hǎiguī«
2. sb who has come back to China after gaining overseas experience (a pun on »hǎiguī«); to return to China after a period of study or work overseas
hǎiguī /hai3 gui1/*
hǎiguīguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. turtle; Internet slang for »hǎiguī«
2. sb who has come back to China after gaining overseas experience (a pun on »hǎiguī«); to return to China after a period of study or work overseas
hǎiguī /hai3 gui1/*
hǎiguīle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. turtle; Internet slang for »hǎiguī«
2. sb who has come back to China after gaining overseas experience (a pun on »hǎiguī«); to return to China after a period of study or work overseas

■ (in elections for village committees in the PRC since the 1990s) unrestricted nomination, a type of election where 1. everyone in the community is eligible to nominate somebody 2. voting is done by writing the name of one's nominee on the ballot, and 3. one's nominee can be anyone in the community (Nominees who receive the highest number of votes may be thereby elected or, more often, presented as the candidates in a further round of voting.); (in other contexts) selection of the best contender in a process open to all comers; (in the entertainment industry) open audition

hǎn /han3/
1. to yell; to shout; to call out for (a person)
2. rare
3. (literary) (of a tiger) to growl; to roar
4. Nasturtium montanum
hǎn /han3/
hǎnzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to yell; to shout; to call out for (a person)
2. rare
3. (literary) (of a tiger) to growl; to roar
4. Nasturtium montanum
hǎn /han3/
hǎnguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to yell; to shout; to call out for (a person)
2. rare
3. (literary) (of a tiger) to growl; to roar
4. Nasturtium montanum
hǎn /han3/
hǎnle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to yell; to shout; to call out for (a person)
2. rare
3. (literary) (of a tiger) to growl; to roar
4. Nasturtium montanum

hǎndào /han3 dao4/*
hǎndàoguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.

hǎndào /han3 dao4/*
hǎndàole, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
■ to yell

hǎo /hao3/
1. good
2. appropriate; proper
3. all right!
4. (before a verb) easy to
5. (before a verb) good to
6. (before an adjective for exclamatory effect) so
7. (verb complement indicating completion)
8. (of two people) close; on intimate terms
9. (after a personal pronoun) hello

1. perspiration; sweat; CL: dī, tóu, shēn

16. protuberant eyes
17. lotus blossom
18. Aulacophora femoralis
19. (canine)
20. gate of a village
21. a white pheasant
22. (of horse) fierce; wild

hànzi /han4 zi5/*
■ man; fellow; (dialect) husband
hànzì /han4zi4/
■ Chinese character(s)
hànzìcházìfǎ /han4 zi4 cha2 zi4 fa3/*
■ look-up method for Chinese characters
hànzìzìtǐ /han4 zi4 zi4 ti3/*
■ calligraphic style of Chinese characters; typeface; font
Hànzú /Han4 zu2/*
■ Han ethnic group
Hàn Gāozǔ /Han4 Gao1 zu3/*
■ posthumous name of the first Han emperor Liu Bang (256 or 247-195 BC), reigned 202-195 BC
Hàn Líng Dì /Han4 Ling2 Di4/*
■ Emperor Ling of Han (156-189), reigned from 168 to 189
Hàn Míng Dì /Han4 Ming2 Di4/*
■ Emperor Ming of Han (28-75), Western Han Dynasty Emperor 58-75
Hàn Wéndì /Han4 Wen2 di4/*
■ Emperor Wen of Han (202-157 BC), fourth Han emperor, personal name Liu Heng »Liú Héng«, reigned 180-157 BC
Hàn Wǔdì /Han4 Wu3 di4/*
■ Emperor Wu of the Han dynasty (141-87 BC)
Hàn Xiàndì /Han4 Xian4 di4/*
■ Emperor Xian of Han (181-234), the final Han emperor, set up by Dong Zhuo , reigned 189-220, forced to abdicate 220 by Cao Pi
Hàn Xuāndì /Han4 Xuan1 di4/*
■ Emperor Xuan (91-48 BC) of the Former Han Dynasty, reigned 74-48 BC
Hàn Yīng /Han4 Ying1/*
■ Chinese-English
Hàn Yīnghùyì /Han4 Ying1 hu4 yi4/*
■ Chinese and English two-way translation
Hàn Yuándì /Han4 Yuan2 di4/*
■ Yuan Emperor, reign name of Han Dynasty emperor Liu Shi »Liú Shì«, (74-33 BC), reigned 48-33 BC
Hàn Zàngyǔxì /Han4 Zang4 yu3 xi4/*
■ Sino-Tibetan language family
hào /hao4/
1. to be fond of; to have a tendency to; to be prone to
2. ordinal number; day of a month; mark; sign; business establishment; size; ship suffix; horn (wind instrument); bugle call; assumed name; to take a pulse; classifier used to indicate number of people
3. to waste; to spend; to consume; to squander; news; (coll.) to delay; to dilly-dally
4. grand; vast (water)
5. bright; place name; stove
6. vast and limitless; the vast sky
7. (bound form) bright; luminous; white (esp. bright white teeth of youth or white hair of old age)
8. spotlessly white
9. to desire
10. (literary) (of water) limpid
11. grand; vast (of water)
12. vast (of water)
13. bright; brilliant
14. Cyperus amuricus
15. ancient place name
16. (literary) white and shining
hào /hao4/
hàozhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to be fond of; to have a tendency to; to be prone to
2. ordinal number; day of a month; mark; sign; business establishment; size; ship suffix; horn (wind instrument); bugle call; assumed name; to take a pulse; classifier used to indicate number of people
3. to waste; to spend; to consume; to squander; news; (coll.) to delay; to dilly-dally
4. grand; vast (water)
5. bright; place name; stove
6. vast and limitless; the vast sky
7. (bound form) bright; luminous; white (esp. bright white teeth of youth or white hair of old age)
8. spotlessly white
9. to desire
10. (literary) (of water) limpid
11. grand; vast (of water)
12. vast (of water)
13. bright; brilliant
14. Cyperus amuricus
15. ancient place name
16. (literary) white and shining
hào /hao4/
hàoguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.

2. ordinal number; day of a month; mark; sign; business establishment; size; ship suffix; horn (wind instrument); bugle call; assumed name; to take a pulse; classifier used to indicate number of people
3. to waste; to spend; to consume; to squander; news; (coll.) to delay; to dilly-dally
4. grand; vast (water)

13. bright; brilliant
14. Cyperus amuricus
15. ancient place name
16. (literary) white and shining
hào /hao4/
hàole, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to be fond of; to have a tendency to; to be prone to
2. ordinal number; day of a month; mark; sign; business establishment; size; ship suffix; horn (wind instrument); bugle call; assumed name; to take a pulse; classifier used to indicate number of people
3. to waste; to spend; to consume; to squander; news; (coll.) to delay; to dilly-dally

hē /he1/

2. (bound form) to scold; to expel breath; (onom.) laughter (usu. reduplicated); interjection of surprise
3. (interjection expressing surprise) oh!; wow!
4. to scold
5. to sting

hēchá /he1 cha2/*
■ to drink tea; to get engaged; to have a serious conversation; (fig.) to have a meeting with state security agents (to be warned to behave "responsibly")
hēchá /he1 cha2/*
hēcházhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

hē xīběi fēng /he1 xi1bei3 feng1/

hé /he2/

2. (math.) sum
3. to make peace
4. (sports) to draw; to tie
5. (bound form) harmonious
6. (bound form) Japan; Japanese
7. (literary) harmonious
8. what; how; why; which; carry

10. small box; case
11. river; CL: tiáo, dào
12. (bound form) the Yellow River; (bound form) the Milky Way; (bound form) (on restaurant menus) rice noodles »héfěn«
13. pit; stone; nucleus; nuclear; to examine; to check; to verify
14. to investigate
15. lotus
16. raccoon dog (Nyctereutes procyonoides); raccoon of North China, Korea and Japan (Japanese: tanuki); also pr. »háo«
17. cereal; grain
18. (bound form) jaw
19. door; to close; whole
20. to beat; to hit
21. to impeach
22. why; how; when; what; where
23. to dry; to dry up
24. vessel similar to a kettle, but with three or four legs, used in ancient times for warming wine
25. why not
26. tassels
27. quill
28. name of a person
29. small bell
30. obstruct
31. buskin; name of a tribe; turban
32. deep-fried noodle cake, also known as »sǎnzi«
33. (archaic) blowfish
34. crossbill; long-tailed pheasant
35. (literary) to gnaw; to bite

hěn /hen3/
1. very; quite; (also, often used before an adjective without intensifying its meaning, i.e. as a meaningless syntactic element)
2. ruthless; fierce; ferocious
3. determined; resolute
4. to harden (one's heart)
5. also used as an exclamation of anger
6. to act contrary to
hěn /hen3/
hěnzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

5. also used as an exclamation of anger
6. to act contrary to
hěn /hen3/
hěnguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.

5. also used as an exclamation of anger
6. to act contrary to
hěn /hen3/

hè /he4/
1. to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence; to join in the singing; to chime in with others
2. to shout
3. to scare; to intimidate; to threaten; (interjection showing disapproval) tut-tut; (interjection showing astonishment)
4. awe-inspiring; abbr. for »hèzī«, hertz (Hz)
5. to carry on one's shoulder or back; burden; responsibility
6. to congratulate
7. brown; gray or dark color; coarse hemp cloth; Taiwan pr. »hé«
8. crane
9. gully; ravine; Taiwan pr. »huò«
10. scold with severity
11. hot
12. fiery; bright
13. frightened; terrified
14. glistening plumage of birds

hōng /hong1/
1. roar of laughter (onom.); hubbub; to roar (as a crowd)
2. explosion; bang; boom; rumble; to attack; to shoo away; to expel
3. to bake; to heat by fire; to set off by contrast
4. sound of a Buddhist incantation
5. to sigh; sound of a drum
6. (onom.) crashing sound; same as »hōng«
7. (archaic) angry appearance
8. death of a prince; swarming
9. sound of a crash
hōng /hong1/
hōngzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

2. explosion; bang; boom; rumble; to attack; to shoo away; to expel
3. to bake; to heat by fire; to set off by contrast

5. to sigh; sound of a drum
6. (onom.) crashing sound; same as »hōng«
7. (archaic) angry appearance
8. death of a prince; swarming
9. sound of a crash
hōng /hong1/
hōngguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.

2. explosion; bang; boom; rumble; to attack; to shoo away; to expel
3. to bake; to heat by fire; to set off by contrast

5. to sigh; sound of a drum
6. (onom.) crashing sound; same as »hōng«

9. sound of a crash
hōng /hong1/

hóngmǎjiǎ /hong2 ma3 jia3/*
■ red waistcoat; (stock market) floor trader; floor broker
hóngmǎnǎo /hong2 ma3 nao3/*
■ cornelian
hóngméisù /hong2 mei2 su4/*
■ erythromycin
hóngméi huāquè /hong2mei2 hua1que4/
■ (bird species of China) red avadavat (Amandava amandava)
hóngméi sōngquè /hong2mei2 song1que4/
■ (bird species of China) crimson-browed finch (Carpodacus subhimachalus)
hóngméi zhūquè /hong2mei2 zhu1que4/
■ (bird species of China) Chinese beautiful rosefinch (Carpodacus davidianus)
hóngméng /hong2meng2/
■ (literary) primordial chaos (mythological void state preceding the creation of the universe)
Hóngményàn /Hong2 men2 yan4/*
■ Hongmen feast; (fig.) banquet set up with the aim of murdering a guest; refers to a famous episode in 206 BC when future Han emperor Liu Bang »Liú Bāng« escaped attempted murder by his rival Xiang Yu »Xiàng Yǔ«
Hóngmiàocūn /Hong2 miao4 cun1/*
■ Hongmiao village in Mudan District »Mǔdan Qū« of Heze City, Shandong
hóngmíngdān /hong2 ming2 dan1/*
■ whitelist
hóngmó /hong2 mo2/*
■ iris (of an eye)
hóngmù /hong2 mu4/*
■ red wood; mahogany; rosewood; padauk
hóngnánlǜnǚ /hong2 nan2 lu:4 nu:3/*
■ young people decked out in gorgeous clothes (idiom)
hóngniáng /hong2 niang2/*
■ matchmaker
